programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: After a close call, Leaphorn and Chee follow the trail of a new suspect; the discovery of a body sends Special Agent Washington in a different direction; Manuelito puts a target on her back as she digs deeper into the mystery.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Navajo Tribal Policeman Joe Leaphorn must solve a series of crimes; he partners with new deputy, Jim Chee, who is back on the reservation for the first time since he was a child; together they face down evil forces, both earthly and supernatural.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn and Chee interview the surviving witness to the Big Rock Motel murders; Chee meets with the coroner; the cause of death remains a mystery; Sgt. Manuelito makes a chilling discovery of her own.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn's niece celebrates her Kinaaldá as Leaphorn retrieves the bodies of the murder victims; Manuelito and Chee investigate the whereabouts of the missing Mormon family.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn suspects all of the crimes on the reservation are related; there is a big break in the case; Leaphorn invites Chee over for dinner; Manuelito makes a discovery of her own.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: With a major suspect in custody, Leaphorn discovers that there is more to this crime than he would have ever imagined; Manuelito faces her worst fears; Chee must make a choice between his career and his people.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn, Chee and Manuelito descend on the hiding place of the Buffalo Society, only to be confronted with hard decisions that could change the outcome of the rest of their lives.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Navajo Tribal Policeman Joe Leaphorn investigates the death of a man involved in a mysterious cult, while Jim Chee, moonlighting as a PI, works a case of his own; when their investigations collide, Leaphorn and Chee find themselves in grave danger.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn explores personal ties to an increasingly mysterious case; Chee is questioned by a reluctant Sgt. Manuelito; the discovery of a body sends Leaphorn and Manuelito in pursuit of a child in danger.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: After facing off with a dangerous man, Chee strikes out on his own; Leaphorn and Manuelito partner with the sheriff's department, leading Leaphorn to identify a vital clue.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn risks his life in pursuit of a suspect; Manuelito stands up to the sheriff in a bid to rescue her boss; seeking answers on a case, Chee considers a dangerous proposition.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: With his suspect in custody, Leaphorn races against the clock to get a confession while Chee goes under cover at the cult that ties their investigations together; Manuelito counsels a teenager who is nervous about the draft.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn and Chee discover evidence that connects their cases, only for Leaphorn to realize justice won't be easily served; Manuelito prepares for a big life change.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Leaphorn and Sgt. Jim Chee investigate the disappearance of a Navajo boy; Manuelito makes a sinister discovery while adjusting to life on the border patrol; an FBI agent comes to solve a case linked to Leaphorn's recent past.

programme.title: Dark Winds
programme.desc: Leaphorn and Chee find themselves on a manhunt after making a shocking discovery; Special Agent Washington questions Leaphorn about a person of interest; Manuelito puts her job on the line when she searches for answers at a local ranch.

programme.title: The Woodsman
programme.desc: The Rhodes family has endured trials and tribulations over the past several years, but God has always been at the center. Hear their story going back to 2020 and then watch as they knock down some great bucks this past season.

programme.title: HUNTER
programme.desc: Dave shares deer camp with a group of friends in the Mississippi Delta where the good times are as important as the big bucks!

programme.title: Bow Madness
programme.desc: This week's episode is a split between whitetail and Big Game action as The Morris family and Brandon Jennings pursue a grab bag of Elk and Whitetails!

programme.title: Buckmasters
programme.desc: Jackie hunts Montgomery Properties Ranch in Texas, then crossbow hunts in Alabama.

programme.title: Jokers Wild Off The Hook
programme.desc: Jeff Coyle joins Hunt Fish Maniacs for epic helicopter adventure for salmon / trout.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Denis and Chad join their friend/guide Jacob to float some rivers in Oregon to chase Steelhead.

programme.title: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin links up with his pal, Bill Darsinos, to enjoy a tradition from the heart of Bill's Greek culture when they cook a whole lamb on a spit roast.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Field To Fire
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern trudges down along the banks of a Minnesota river in search of the state's official fish--the walleye. He uses his catch to prepare a delicious fried walleye dish with lemon sauce and charred greens.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here

programme.desc: When a beloved member of a tight-knit community is killed, the town cries out for immediate justice; after a young man is sentenced to death for the crime, and an out-of-town lawyer argues they convicted an innocent man.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: The murder of a gender-nonconforming Black teenager remains unsolved despite pressure from family and friends - raising issues about the increase of violence, and the lack of justice for trans murder victims across the country.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: Years after the body of a young woman is found strangled to death in a creek bed, law enforcement finally closes the case; a closer look raises questions about the investigation.

programme.desc: After a terrible boating accident killed her family, shy Angela Baker is sent to Camp Arawak where a series of bizarre and violent �accidents� occur.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: Trish's slumber party for her basketball teammates includes an unexpected guest.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre II
programme.desc: A teen and her friends are terrorized by a rock star whose guitar is fitted with a drill bit.

programme.title: Hide and Go Shriek
programme.desc: A group of teens celebrate their graduation in a furniture store, where a psychotic killer hunts them down.

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: Christie's nightmares grow worse after her father drowns, revealing a sinister truth tied to the mortuary.

programme.title: 50 States of Fright
programme.desc: Prepare for a chilling double feature as a stolen golden prosthetic arm awakens a vengeful spirit, followed by a harrowing tale of murder in a haunted hotel room, all capped off with a surprise short film that will leave you breathless.

programme.title: 50 States of Fright
programme.desc: Get ready for a spine-tingling anthology as a woman's desperate climb to safety turns into a nightmare, followed by a sinister journey to a cursed island with dark secrets, all topped off with a surprise short film that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

programme.title: 50 States of Fright
programme.desc: Brace yourself for a thrilling anthology, starting with a quest for a magical destination, a descent into a haunted well, a petrifying taxidermy experience, and a small town�s dark secret surrounding its famed azaleas. Finally, witness the eerie mystery of America's largest ball of twine.

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Discovered by businessman Tim Daland, Cole is teamed with legendary crew chief and car-builder Harry Hogge to race for the Winston Cup at the Daytona 500. A crash nearly ends Cole’s career and he must turn to a beautiful doctor to regain his nerve.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Two thrill-seeking adventurers cross paths with a beautiful doctor and they find themselves on the ultimate hunt for a treasure that claims all who seek it.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo finds himself increasingly captivated by a woman he's never met while investigating the murder of her brother.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tries to track down a serial killer, while Abby heads south of the border to give a speech with McGee in tow.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a colleague's murder sends shockwaves through the team, Gibbs uncovers a surprising link to the crime.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs heads to Mexico to face his demons and make a startling decision.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Brad’s witch hunting gene goes into overdrive when Sabrina comes down with Spring Fever.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: The West gets even wilder when Sabrina takes the reins as town sheriff.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Cousin Amanda returns to give Sabrina a little competition in the teenage witch -and love-- department.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Choosing a college literally tears Sabrina apart when she tries too hard to make everyone happy.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: After four years of enduring Sabrina’s spells and strange behavior, Harvey finally suspects she is a witch
programme.sub-title: The End Of An Era (Season Finale)

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Sabrina’s Sweet 16 becomes a truly magical birthday when she discovers she’s a witch.

programme.title: Sabrina: The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Under the influence of truth sprinkles, Sabrina learns honesty is the best policy.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: Discovering that Emmet faked his own death, Victoria decides to follow suit to be with him, as Simon rethinks his career, and Melanie dates a guy who doesn't spoon correctly.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: Victoria is shocked when her daughter Emmy shows up very pregnant, Bob tells his parents he's engaged to Joy, Melanie's dentist is misled by texts, and Elka has a fling.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: Determined to secure Oscar nomination votes, Victoria has the women target a former heartthrob, a young actress and an old-time Western star.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: With their hearts set on an adorable dog, Melanie, Victoria, and Joy are scammed by a handsome young rescue center inspector, as Elka and Mamie Sue simultaneously date Roy.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: Melanie capitalizes on her brain tumor to meet a singer, Joy sleeps with a tell-all DJ, and Victoria has an online romance that isn't what it seems.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: When their dog George acts depressed, the women bring in an animal-communicating radio host, who advises them to remove the negativity in their household.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: In New York, the women stay with Victoria's acting school roommate, Melanie lives in the moment, Joy wants to be a Rockette, and Elka hawks her polish.
programme.sub-title: Bucket: We're Going to New York

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: Joy falls for Bob while working undercover with him, Melanie hosts a 24-hour marathon of her radio show, and Elka decides to run against Councilman Powell.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Steve McGarrett flies to Los Angeles to build a case against a doctor who is victimizing his sister and her ill baby.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Steve McGarrett takes a cure-all practitioner to court although public sentiment favors her and she seems to have a foolproof case.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: When a young leader of a peace movement is shot and killed, Five-O's investigation seems to face a blank wall. In seeking the culprit, McGarrett and his team of police experts must determine whether the victim — or someone else— was the intended target.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Five-O intercepts a box man, an expert safe cracker, at the Honolulu airport. The criminal is killed by a shot from Dan Williams, who fired just before the criminal would have shot Chin Ho.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Apparitions of an ancient goddess of the volcano, avant-garde underground movies, and a concerned nephew and his wife all tie together in the apparent efforts of someone trying to do away with an old man in order to gain control of his valuable land.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: In the opening installment, a U.S. intelligent agent, friend of McGarrett's, turns up dead on a Honolulu beach. McGarrett, knowing the man didn't swim, decides to investigate the death as a homicide.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: According to Ancient Astronaut Theorists, the placement of monoliths and their geological makeup could point to extraterrestrial intervention.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Discussing whether ancient cultures could have encountered extraterrestrial beings that have achieved eternal life, and discussing the Ancient Astronaut Theorists suggestions.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient astronaut theorist Giorgio A. Tsoukalos explores the latest scientific discoveries at some of the world's most ancient places to find evidence that extraterrestrials visited Egypt in the distant past.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: More than 10,000 crop circle formations have been documented in over 50 countries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Theorists suggest that some extraterrestrials may closely resemble animals, as evidenced by gods depicted with animal traits; researchers suggest that some animals may have been planted here by aliens as part of an experiment to shape life on Earth.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.title: South Park: Fourth Grade
programme.desc: 4th Grade: The boys enter the 4th grade and take a fast dislike to their new teacher, Ms Choksondik. Meanwhile, Mr Garrison realises he needs to acknowledge and confront his "gay side". (S4, E11)

programme.title: South Park: Trapper Keeper
programme.desc: Trapper Keeper: Cartman is none too happy when 'Bill Cosby' tells him his ultra-advanced Trapper Keeper 2000 is destined to become sentient and wipe out humanity. That kinda sucks ay? (S4, E12)

programme.title: South Park: Helen Keller! The Musical
programme.desc: Helen Keller! The Musical: The boys stage a Thanksgiving play about the life of author Helen Keller, starring Timmy as Helen. There's trouble involving his favourite turkey, Gobbles. (S4, E13)

programme.title: South Park: Pip!
programme.desc: Pip (a.k.a. Great Expectations): South Park's unusual version of the classic Dickens tale, featuring robot monkeys and the Genesis Device! Narrated in vision by Malcolm McDowell. (S4, E14)

programme.title: South Park: Fat Camp
programme.desc: Fat Camp: Cartman is sent to fat camp in order to resolve his weight problem but all is not as it seems when he returns skinny. Kenny gets his own TV show where he performs disgusting acts. (S4, E15)

programme.title: South Park: The Wacky Molestation Adventure
programme.desc: The Wacky Molestation Adventure: Kyle has his parents arrested so he can go to a concert but things get out of hand and it's not long before there are no adults left in town! (S4, E16)

programme.title: South Park: A Very Crappy Christmas
programme.desc: A Very Crappy Christmas: When Mr Hankey fails to show up at Christmas time the boys go looking for him in the sewers. Can the gang revive the spirit of Christmas with their own cartoon? (S4, E17)

programme.title: South Park: Scott Tenorman Must Die
programme.desc: Scott Tenorman Must Die: Cartman is tricked into buying pubic hair by Scott Tenorman. Outraged at being laughed at, he plots the most sickest, evil revenge possible... Radiohead guest star. (S5, E04)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When hippie drum circles start popping up in people's attics and backyards the citizens of South Park have no choice but to turn to Eric Cartman for help.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys set up a talent agency and pool all their resources and impress their first client only to have another agency steal him away.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny is the only one of his friends to get the newest, coolest portable gaming device and Cartman can't deal with it. Will they remain best friends forever?

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The kids desperately want an end to the boring baseball season. The problem is, they keep winning.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman is sure he's dead and Butters is sure that Eric Cartman's ghost is haunting him. Together they attempt to make amends to all the people Cartman has wronged over the years.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The South Park Elementary School Talent Show is coming up and Jimmy can't wait to perform his comedy routine, but first, he must find a way to gain control of his raging hormones.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Butters must fake his death, dress up as a girl and infiltrate a slumber party, in order to retrieve a future-telling device Cartman is convinced the girls have.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: In an effort to thwart her ex-lovers plans to get married, Mrs. Garrison leads the charge against gay marriage.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After the sudden on-set of the disease Gingervitis, Cartman rallies all other ginger kids to rise up and assume their role as the master race.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Scientologists converge on Stan's house after he is identified as the reincarnation of L. Ron Hubbard. One A-lister locks himself in the closet and refuses to come out after Stan criticizes his 'talent.'

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys try to rescue their new friend Willzyx, a talking space whale, from the Denver Sea Park, and with the help of MASA (Mexican Aeronautica y Spacia Administracion) get him home to the moon for $200.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan is embarrassed when his dad gets pulled over for drunk driving. Randy believes that only one thing can save him from his 'disease,' a bleeding statue of the Virgin Mary in the next town.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Chef returns to South Park after spending time away with a group called, 'The Super Adventure Club,' but when his strange behavior starts getting him in trouble, the boys risk everything to save him.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle and his family are moving to San Francisco. The only way Stan can get his best friend back is to convince everyone to start driving hybrid cars.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Towelie gets over his drug addiction and writes his memoirs. With Oprah's support, his book becomes a best seller and his story inspires millions to turn their lives around.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Al Gore warns the school about the threat of Manbearpig.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When Cartman's mom realizes she can't control her son anymore, she gets help from an expert. The "Dog Whisperer" may have what it takes but Eric Cartman's not going down without a fight.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys dedicate their lives to defeating a mad gamer and saving the World of Warcraft.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The world's biggest conspiracy of all time is finally uncovered when Eric Cartman exposes the true culprit behind the September 11th attacks.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: In his new role as School Hallway Monitor at South Park Elementary, Cartman must team up with Kyle when they discover a teacher having sex with a student.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Satan is throwing the biggest Halloween costume party ever. Just like a girl getting ready for her sweet sixteen, every detail must be perfect for the prince of darkness. The antics of the most notorious serial killers of all time threaten his fun.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: South Park Elementary faces strong opposition to the topic of evolution. Cartman's too busy to notice as he plans to propel himself into the future on the precise release date of the newest, hottest game console.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Eric Cartman has frozen himself in an attempt to make his three-week wait for a Nintendo Wii pass quickly. A freak accident landed him over 500 years in the future and now, he's stuck in a Godless world on the brink of war with no Nintendo Wii.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan Marsh has hit rock bottom. He's got no job, no bicycle, and his only way out of a bad situation is to coach the local peewee hockey team.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After Randy Marsh experiences an unfortunate incident on national TV, the "N" bomb hits South Park. While Randy seeks forgiveness from Jesse Jackson, South Park Elementary invites a midget by the name of Dr. Nelson to talk about sensitivity.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When his "ultimate plan" to embarrass Butters backfires, Cartman struggles to keep his classmates from seeing a compromising photograph. Meanwhile, Butters is sent to a special camp where they "Pray the Gay Away."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: An infestation of head lice plagues South Park Elementary. When Mr. Garrison refuses to name names, Cartman finds a way to detect who has lice in the hopes of making fun of his unfortunate classmate.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: While Cartman follows a lead on a possible terrorist attack, Hillary Clinton makes a campaign stop in South Park for a big rally.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Determined to get the real story behind why he has to decorate eggs for Easter, Stan falls in with an eccentric society that guards a legendary secret.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ms. Garrison gets dumped again and takes her frustration out on the fourth grade class. However, things start looking up for her when she meets a new friend at the gym and they go out for drink at a local "girl bar."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As an increasing number of homeless people are begging for change all over South Park, the boys work to solve the homeless problem once and for all.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman discovers the joys of having Tourette’s syndrome. Drunk with the power of saying whatever he wants without getting in trouble for it, he lines up national TV coverage to take advantage of his new life with no filters.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan’s dad becomes South Park’s home-town hero when the guys down at the local bar see the size of his most recent crap.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When the entire contents of the world’s imagination lay open before them, Stan and Kyle step right in. Back in South Park, Cartman swears he’s seen a leprechaun.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan and Kyle are being held in the bowels of the Pentagon until they tell the government how they got into Imaginationland. Meanwhile, Cartman simply won’t rest until he finds Kyle and gets him to make good on their bet to suck his balls.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Inside Imaginationland, Stan and Butters engage in the battle of their lives as they fight the army of evil imaginary forces. Meanwhile, Cartman goes all the way to the Supreme Court to get Kyle to pay up on their bet.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan and Kyle are hooked on Guitar Hero. Unfortunately, Stan’s superior skills on the video game damage his friendship with Kyle.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When a famous psychic fails to help him exorcise Kenny from his body, Cartman and Chef travel to the moors of Scotland, where Chef's mom tries a little of her voodoo magic on him.
programme.sub-title: The Biggest Douche in the Universe

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny is the only one of his friends to get the newest, coolest portable gaming device and Cartman can't deal with it. Will they remain best friends forever?

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: In a South Park homage to the 1981 film, "Heavy Metal", the boys are trying to get Kenny off the latest drug craze that’s captured the junior high and under set.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny takes his new girlfriend to a Jonas Brothers’ concert where they each get purity rings.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman dreams of being a NASCAR driver and he’s willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Coon and Friends set out to help the victims of BP’s latest catastrophic drilling accident in the Gulf. Much to the Coon’s dismay, another Super Hero gets there first.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Mysterion’s true identity is revealed. Meanwhile, the Coon, scorned by his fellow Super Heroes, is out for revenge.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Coon and Friends find themselves at the mercy of Cartman who now has the dark lord, Cthulhu, doing his bidding. Kenny wrestles with the curse of his super power through his alter ego, Mysterion.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny ends up in the foster care system after his parents are arrested.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: It is time for Butters to begin a journey where he will follow in the path of his Hawaiian ancestors.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys prepare to battle the crowds already lining up for the first official day of holiday shopping.

programme.title: CBS Weekend News
programme.desc: Journalist Adriana Diaz anchors the Saturday edition of the CBS news program from Chicago, while Jericka Duncan takes the helm of the Sunday broadcast from New York. The two are the latest to fill the roll of weekend anchor, which was most recently represented by Reena Ninan and Eliane Quijano. The program offers the latest headlines, original reporting and in-depth pieces that add context and perspective to the world's events.

programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: This newsmagazine investigates intriguing crime and justice cases that touch on all aspects of the human experience. Over its long run, the show has helped exonerate wrongly convicted people, driven the reopening -- and resolution -- of cold cases, and changed numerous lives. CBS News correspondents offer an in-depth look into each story, with the emphasis on solving the mystery at its heart. The program and its team have earned critical acclaim, including multiple Emmy, Peabody and Edward R. Murrow Awards.

programme.title: CBS Weekend News
programme.desc: Journalist Adriana Diaz anchors the Saturday edition of the CBS news program from Chicago, while Jericka Duncan takes the helm of the Sunday broadcast from New York. The two are the latest to fill the roll of weekend anchor, which was most recently represented by Reena Ninan and Eliane Quijano. The program offers the latest headlines, original reporting and in-depth pieces that add context and perspective to the world's events.

programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. programme.title: CBS News Sunday Morning
programme.desc: The sparkling notes of a trumpet fanfare and the familiar logo of the sun alert viewers that it's time for CBS's Sunday morning staple. Journalist Jane Pauley helms the show, taking over hosting duties from Charles Osgood, who spent 22 years on the job. A morning talk show, this program airs at a different pace and focuses much of its attention on the performing arts. After a quick update of the day's news and national weather, correspondents offer longer-length segments on a variety of topics, from architecture to ballet to music to pop culture to politics.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: "Bunco Players vs. Poker Players" Two teams of friends and family race against a clock to guess how America filled in the blanks on a series of survey questions covering every topic under the sun. John Michael Higgins hosts.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: "Church Group vs. Tennis Team" Two teams of friends and family race against a clock to guess how America filled in the blanks on a series of survey questions covering every topic under the sun. John Michael Higgins hosts.

programme.title: Common Knowledge
programme.desc: "The Ortegas vs. Justice Pals" Joey Fatone hosts as teams of three compete to answer practical, everyday questions that everyone should know, such as how to avoid fingerprints on shiny chrome fixtures.

programme.title: Common Knowledge
programme.desc: "Music Men vs. Fun Teachers" In this second chance episode, teams that missed their shot at the grand prize return to answer practical, everyday questions that everyone should know, such as what time of day is a child's brain most primed for studying?

programme.title: Idiotest
programme.desc: "Substitute Teacher vs. Cat Owner" Comedian Ben Gleib hosts as a substitute teacher and her friend face off against a man who has a transgender cat and his roommate to answer increasingly difficult brain teaser puzzles.

programme.title: Idiotest
programme.desc: "Pet Lovers vs. Pet Haters" Comedian Ben Gleib hosts this rivalry episode of Idiotest as pet lovers face off against pet haters to answer increasingly difficult brain teaser puzzles.

programme.title: Catch 21
programme.desc: "Below Deck" Players add cards by answering pop trivia questions and try to build the closest hand to 21 without "busting" in this fast-action game of knowledge and strategy.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: "What's That Smell?" Jerry Springer hosts as daters decide how much emotional "baggage" to put up with when finding love. A dater must choose between women whose baggage includes hoarding rotten food and sleeping for 18 hours a day.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: "At Least it's Not Poisonous" Jerry Springer hosts as daters decide how much emotional "baggage" to put up with when finding love. A dater must choose between men whose baggage includes sleeping with an 18ft python and modeling his life after Japanese anime.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: "Salads Are For Rabbits" Jerry Springer hosts as daters decide how much emotional "baggage" to put up with when finding love. A dater must choose between men whose baggage includes never eating vegetables and having no respect for other people's time.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: ""Cry Baby"Jerry Springer hosts as daters decide how much emotional "baggage" they are willing to put up with when finding love. A dater must choose between women whose baggage includes crying once a day and sleeping with 24 stuffed animals at night.

programme.title: Mind of a Man
programme.desc: "The Weekend" Comedian DeRay Davis hosts a game show in which two female contestants, with the help of a celebrity panel, try to figure out what men really think. Celebrity panelists: Ray Grady, Brooke Hogan, Alonzo Bodden.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: "Long Story Short" A unique game show which is as much about convincing others as it is about knowing the right answers. Four strangers including a pharmaceutical cosmetologist and an optician must debate and unanimously agree against a racing clock.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: "Come Together" A unique game show which is as much about convincing others as it is about being right. Four strangers including a journalist and a tire technician must debate and unanimously agree against a racing clock. Hosted by Mike Richards.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: "Don’t Break My Heart" Jerry Springer hosts as daters decide how much emotional "baggage" they are willing to put up with when finding love. A dater must choose between women whose baggage includes being terrified of fish and owning a dog that isn't house broken.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: "On Holiday" Jerry Springer hosts as daters decide how much emotional "baggage" they are willing to put up with when finding love. A dater must choose between men whose baggage includes sharing several credit cards with an ex and not believing in holidays.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: "Party of Two" Jerry Springer hosts as daters decide how much emotional "baggage" they are willing to put up with when finding love. A dater must choose between women whose baggage includes being born with an extra finger and spending 50% of income on partying.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: "Head Over Heels" Jerry Springer hosts as daters decide how much emotional "baggage" they are willing to put up with when finding love. A dater must choose between men whose baggage includes using separate plates for all foods and dumpster diving.

programme.title: Mind of a Man
programme.desc: "I Speak Their Language" Comedian DeRay Davis hosts a game show in which two female contestants, with the help of a celebrity panel, try to figure out what men really think. Celebrity panelists: Naim Lynn, Julia Lillis, Alonzo Bodden.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: "Let the Button Do the Talking" This unique game show is as much about convincing others as it is about accuracy. Four strangers must debate and unanimously agree, answering questions like how involved brides say they were in selecting their own rings.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: "Making That Money, Honey" This game show is as much about convincing others as it is about being right. Four strangers must debate and unanimously agree against a racing clock to answer questions including what Beyonce's fan base call themselves.

programme.title: 25 Words or Less
programme.desc: 25 Words or Less includes two teams comprised of celebrities and civilians against each other in a fast-paced word game with a top prize of $10,000. In the beginning rounds of the game, after a frenzied bidding session, one team member provides clues to two partners to help them guess a list of five words using only 25 words or less.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.sub-title: WPT Cash Game $100/$200 No Limit Holdem 2022 - Part 6
programme.desc: This episode of WPT high stakes cash has all of the entertainment that you would expect from such a high-profile cast that includes the likes of Maria Ho, Steve Aoki, Darren Elias, Andrew Neeme, Ema Zajmovic, and Bryan Ercolano.

programme.title: World Poker Tour

programme.desc: There are four remaining in the fight for over $500,000. Chance Kornuth is looking to add another huge cash to his tournament poker resume but is trailing the new chip leader, Tuan Phan, by only a small margin.

programme.desc: As we approach a dramatic finish to the Gardens Casino WPT Main Event, the tides have turned.

programme.title: World Poker Tour

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - Back Country Trout Fishing
programme.desc: What a journey it's been over the last three weeks! We kicked off our adventure in Eastern Sears Creek, making our first casts to see what the waters would yield. From there, we headed to South Lake for some laid-back pontoon trout fishing. After a relaxing day by the lake, complete with apple pie and cold beverages, we followed expert advice from Jared to venture back into the heart of nature. Our trek led us to Long Lake, nestled just above South Lake, offering more stunning views and fishing spots. Today on Stoked on Fishing, we're picking up where we left off. We'll dive deeper into understanding the lakes, figuring out what the rainbow and brook trout are biting on, and trying our best to land a few. Join us as our backcountry adventure continues.

programme.title: Stoked on Fishing - Exploring the Sierras: Owens River Fly Fishing
programme.desc: Wow, holy Eastern Sierra! It's been a full month of trout shows, and we've been trying to cover as much as possible with trout fishing in the creeks above Bishop. We teamed up with Jared at South and Sabrina Lake, and then we did a day hike back into God's country to Long Lake, which was incredible. Today on Stoked on Fishing, we're stopping by Mammoth's one and only Rick's Sports Center to get schooled on some fly fishing on the Owens River, just above Lake Crowley. I promise you, this is an ending to a show you won't want to miss. Ryan got a big one; Ryan got a big one!

programme.title: Angling Buzz - Summer Midwest Fishing
programme.desc: It's late June and right now it's primetime for hot river fishing across the Upper Midwest for a variety of different reasons. programme.title: Angling Buzz - Summer Midwest Fishing
programme.desc: It's late June and right now it's primetime for hot river fishing across the Upper Midwest for a variety of different reasons. programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Deer season — the sights, the sounds and the smells stick with you. It’s about remembering those who came before us and setting the right example for those who look up to us. It’s about protecting the tradition, so they always have something to look forward to. When communities come together, we see the real reason for this special time of year.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.sub-title: "Freak Show - Largest Buck I’ve Ever Encountered"
programme.desc: The hunt for FREAK SHOW became a thrilling adventure after I spotted him on Cabela’s trail cam. Having hunted Kentucky for over a decade and established my own properties—Bootleggers Ridge and Stonewall Plantation—I was eager for the chance at such a remarkable deer. Despite having drawn a coveted caribou tag through Worldwide Trophy Adventures’ TAGS Program, the allure of FREAK SHOW was too strong to resist. After careful planning and waiting for the right wind, I finally - set out on September 11. With my crossbow in hand, I waited anxiously in the stand, my heart racing as the shadows lengthened. Just when I thought the evening might end without a sighting, a movement caught my eye, sending my pulse soaring. With caution, FREAK SHOW appeared.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.sub-title: "Opening Week in Mississippi started off with a BANG!!"
programme.desc: Opening day in Mississippi has arrived and Slade is taking full advantage of it! With the weather not cooperating Slade and Zeb stumble into a turkey hunt they won't soon forget. Two days later, the hot streak continues with Slade connecting on another turkey on an 83 acre property he has for sale! Also, Slade gives some tips and his ideas on small acreage hunting, and how it can be just as lucrative as big tracks of land!

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: For decades, Paul Butski has set the standard in turkey calling. His name is etched into the NWTF Grand National Calling Championships Hall of Fame, and his influence stretches far beyond the stage. He didn’t just win competitions, he shaped the way we talk to turkeys – and more importantly, the way we hunt them.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Todd Rogers embraces the business of being a hunting outfitter as a labor of love. And while so many family-run operations are dwindling in rural America, the Rogers legacy is here to stay. Will Cooper and Josh Dahlke return to western Oklahoma to share this story while pursuing brush-country whitetails in the red dirt.

programme.title: The Raven Project

programme.title: Behind The Draw
programme.sub-title: "Montana Public Land Mule Deer! Mike's Velvet Buck! (Part 1)"
programme.desc: Mike makes a wild stalk on a beautiful velvet mule deer buck. The entire week was a week to remember filled with many ups and downs. We can't thank our buddy Cody enough for inviting us out! Don't miss Part 1 of this epic Montana bowhunt!

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Can You Surf & Eat Like a Local in Minnesota? Wild Foraging & Delicious Local Eats"
programme.desc: In Episode 3, Josh starts off in the Twin Cities where he meets up with Yia Vang, an award-winning Hmong chef and restaurant owner, bringing his family’s traditions and flavors to the American Midwest. As Josh heads up north to Duluth and the boundary waters, he’ll meet plenty of farmers and foragers—harvesting mushrooms, wild rice, and catching a few fish (and waves) along the way. It all wraps up with an epic feast hosted by Yia back in the cities.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Exploring New York City's Hidden Culinary Gems: Cooking Goat Brains, Lobster & MORE"
programme.desc: New. York. City. That’s where our host Josh Rosen kicks off his journey in Episode 4—and where he lived for 16 years and started up the surf-centric apparel brand, Saturdays NYC. Back in his old stomping grounds, Josh first meets up with the award-winning chef and Mumbai native, Chintan Pandya, currently blowing up the New York food scene with his unapologetic and authentic Indian cuisine (pro tip: try the goat brains). Next, Josh travels through the boroughs, heads upstate, and along the coast to source local ingredients—from sake brewers and pig farmers to catching fresh lobster just 100 miles from Wall Street. As always the adventure will end with a feast, right back in Chintan’s kitchen.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.sub-title: DIRT - "Alaskan Fishing, Foraging, & Mountainside Cooking with Local Legends"
programme.desc: Hop in the float plane—a new episode of DIRT just dropped. The DIRT crew made their way to Alaska, “the land of earth, sea, and sky.” All feast, no sleep is the name of the game as Josh makes the most of Alaska’s abundant and legendary daylight alongside local guides, fishermen, and even a couple grizzlies. There’ll be plenty of time to hibernate in winter. But for now—join us—there are halibut to filet, rainforest ’shrooms to forage, and mountainside meals to cook up.

programme.title: TRP
programme.desc: The King of Cedar Key, Capt. Jimbo Keith ⎮ Episode #867 - On Today’s Podcast, I have a very special guest, He is known as the King of Cedar Key, Captain Jimbo Keith. Nearly 40 years ago, Jimbo’s father, Jimbo Sr, founded Saltwater Assassin, the premiere charter fishing company in Cedar Key. Working at the same company, Jimbo heads an airboat through the shallow waters of Northern Florida. Join us in learning about the beautiful Old Florida, and what it is like captaining 270 days out of the year. - Jimbo’s Links: - Saltwater Assassin - https://fishcedarkey.com - Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FishCedarKey/ - Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/captjimbokeith/ - YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA54Q_2S0kUZyv2EtlducmA - My Links: - https://linktr.ee/TomRowlandPodcast - Link to Book Club on: - Tomrowlandpodcast.com.

programme.title: Winchester Life

Also: Competition shooting tips form pro shooter Theo Ribbs.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Every spring brings a new opportunity to take a step forward & recall the memories of seasons past. World War II Veteran and retired Judge Arden Hill has spent most of his life chasing turkeys in the hills of Tennessee. Now in his 90’s, Arden doesn’t let age stand in the way of his love for spring turkey hunting. Also: patterning turkey shotguns and hunting spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Winchester introduces the Shoot United brand aimed at offering useful information and tips to the millions of new shooters entering the shooting sports. Also: Theo Ribbs gives shooting tips for competition and Foster Bartholow reviews Winchester AA Diamond Grade.

Despite a slow start to the season, the Red River provides some of the best hunting yet. With mixed bags of woodies, greenheads, and teal. Not to mention a handful of bonus squirrels and wild mushrooms. Shoot straight and come hungry.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Duck hunting in Louisiana is as much about its history as it is about its future. In the season's final days, Jean-Paul learns about Louisiana’s rich waterfowling history, dives into conservation projects throughout the state, and returns to Bayou Black for one last ride. Shoot straight and come hungry because it's the last hunt of the season.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: The irresistibly serene gulf waters off Panama City Beach lure Justin into taking Capt. Ed Zyak out to see what's biting. It quickly turns into a study session and a lesson. Patience + perseverance = success.

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: Justin has spent a lifetime buying, selling and rigging boats to fit his angling needs. Learn what you need to ask yourself before shopping for the perfect boat and what to look for at the dealership.

programme.title: Local Knowledge

programme.title: Local Knowledge

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The boys are back in the Florida Keys fishing with Capt. Tony Murphy from the Saltwater Angler tackle shop in Key West aboard his 32’ SeaVee. Tony takes the boys into the Gulf of Mexico to chase Permit on wrecks using live crabs for bait. The Gulf doesn’t disappoint and also provides plenty of action from other Florida Keys species.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: With slow pitch jigging being the newest craze, Rush and buddy Dane head out to test some new tackle and go for “mutton or nothing.” Meanwhile in California, Ali gets his hand on the new gear and prepares to hop a flight and join in on the “slow pitch” party with the guys in Key West.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: When the weather in San Diego throws the crew a curveball, Ali, Rush and friend Brandon Nelson put together plan B. Targeting Yellowtail and Mako sharks, the guys search for kelp paddies on the horizon and look to friend at the fish house for some “shark attractant” to make it all come together.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: Welcome to The Fly Shop Tour! In September of 2022, we set across the Rocky Mountains on a 2500 Mile Road Trip visiting & fishing with local Fly Shops. Our Mission? To highlight small businesses that drive the sport we love: Fly Fishing! Along the way, we got a chance to host meetups in every state - all with the goal to raise money for local conservation organizations & meet some of our fans. Follow us as we tell the story of 12 unique fly shops, fish the waters surrounding their area, and make our way throughout the Rocky Mountains.
